Phoenix 500mm f/8 Telephoto Lens & 2x Teleconverter with Case + Tripod + Accessory Kit for Canon EOS Digital SLR Cameras

Kit Also
Includes:

Condition:

BRAND NEW USA

KIT INCLUDES 10 PRODUCTS:
1. Phoenix 500mm f/8 Telephoto Lens (T Mount)
2. Samyang 2x Teleconverter (T Mount)
3. Precision Design PD-58PVTR 58" Photo/Video Tripod with Case
4. Precision Design 1000 Deluxe Digital SLR System Camera Case
5. Precision Design 6-Piece Camera & Lens Cleaning Kit
6. Precision Design T Mount for Canon EOS
7. Rear Lens Cap for Canon EOS

More Accessories
 

ITEM INCLUDES

Phoenix 500mm f/8 Telephoto Lens (T Mount) with:

  • Soft Leather Pouch
  • Front and Rear Lens Caps
  • Instruction Manual
Phoenix 500mm f/8.0 Telephoto Lens (T-Mount)

High-quality telephoto capability at an affordable price!

This powerful Phoenix 500mm f/8 Telephoto Lens utilizes aluminum alloy construction, computer-designed all-glass optics and the latest optical multi-coating techniques to provide crisp, high-contrast, virtually flare-free images of distant subjects, even under adverse lighting conditions.

The aperture settings from f/8 - f/32 retain a full range of exposure / depth of field settings, TTL metering, aperture priority automatic and manual metering capabilities of your camera. For tripod/monopod use, the rotatable tripod mount is positioned to provide optimum balance, and rotates for quick and easy vertical format shooting.

The amazing power of this manual focus lens gives you the equivalent of looking through a pair of 10x power binoculars. This affordable 500mm telephoto is perfect for nature, sports and surveillance photography, and comes complete with a soft carrying case. Manufactured by Samyang.

Key Features:

  • Images magnified up to 10x
  • Multi-coated all-glass elements
  • Rotatable tripod mount
  • Optimized for use with digital SLR cameras using a T-Mount adapter
  • Surprisingly lightweight and compact
  • Versatile enough for use with wildlife, sports, nature and surveillance photography
    Standard 50mm lens with 500mm lens

ITEM INCLUDES

Samyang 2x Teleconverter (T Mount) with:

1 Year Samyang USA Warranty

 Samyang 2x Teleconverter
(T-Mount)

This 2x teleconverter attaches to any T-mount (screw mount) lens, and effectively doubles the focal length of that lens, allowing the photographer to get much closer to the action. This simple, yet high-grade adapter provides excellent optical quality at an affordable price.

ITEM INCLUDES

Precision Design PD-58PVTR 58" Photo/Video Tripod with Case with:

  • Quick Release Plate
  • Carrying Case

10 Year Precision Design USA Warranty

 Precision Design Deluxe Camera Tripod with Case

Get increased performance and extraordinarily sharp pictures

Lightweight and sturdy, this 58-inch tripod is ideal for keeping your camera steady in nearly any location, allowing you to capture crisp, clear, steady images with ease. With the use of a tripod, you can freely shoot at slow shutter speeds and extreme telephoto settings, and you can compose shots with precise control for perfect portraits and group pictures.

Key Features:

  • 3-Way Head (pans, tilts & flips) with Bubble Level
  • Quick Release Camera Mount
  • Sturdy 3-Section 19mm Diameter Legs with Flip Leg Locks
  • Geared Center Column
  • Anti-Skid Feet
  • Built-in Carrying Handle
  • Water-Resistant Carrying Case with Strap
  • Extends to 58 inches, folds to 22 inches
  • Weighs just 2.6 lbs.

3-way pan head
w/ quick release		 Geared center column
w/ bubble level		 Flip leg locks and
anti-skid rubber feet		 Folds down to 22 inches,
weighs just 2.6 pounds

Main Reasons to use a Tripod:

  • Get maximum image quality whether you are shooting stills or video.
  • Extremely sharp pictures even at short focal lengths and macro applications, as well as telephoto settings, where even the smallest movements are magnified.
  • Avoid camera shake from hand holding, and never worry about shooting at slower shutter speeds.
  • Lightweight and sturdy, this tripod includes a carrying case and strap; can be taken anywhere to gain maximum performance from your camera.

ITEM INCLUDES

Precision Design 1000 Deluxe Digital SLR System Camera Case with:

  • Shoulder Strap

1 Year Precision Design USA Warranty

 Precision Design 1000 Deluxe SLR Pro Carrying Case

Protect your valuable equipment with this quality carrying case.

This Precision Design 1000 Deluxe SLR Pro Carrying Case is designed to easily accommodate your digital SLR camera, lenses, flash, and numerous accessories including batteries, memory cards, filters and much more. Made from durable nylon, and outfitted with a reinforced handle, this case will keep your equipment well-protected from light impacts and scratches, while providing ample storage. Features numerous zippered pockets, velcro interior dividers, oversized mesh pocket, rain flap, reinforced sides and an adjustable shoulder strap.

Key Features:

  • Made from durable nylon, outfitted with leather reinforced handle
  • Travel is made easier and safer with slip-resistant shoulder strap
  • Numerous zippered pockets hold all your supplies
  • Main compartment with four velcro dividers provides individual customization
  • Front padded zippered pocket with two inner sewn pockets, plus four pen pockets
  • Oversized mesh pocket with zipper under the top flap
  • Small pocket under the bag's protective rain flap
  • Extra strong, reinforced top, bottom & all four sides to hold heavier equipment
  • Internal Dimensions (WxHxD): 11 x 6.5 x 6 in. (28 x 16.5 x 15.2cm)

ITEM INCLUDES

Precision Design 6-Piece Camera & Lens Cleaning Kit with:

  • Hurricane Air Blower
  • Lens Cleaning Tissues
  • Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
  • Lens Cleaning Liquid
  • Soft Brush
  • Cotton Swabs

1 Year Precision Design USA Warranty

 Precision Design 6-Piece Lens & Digital SLR Cleaning Kit

Essential items for the proper maintenance of your equipment

It's obvious that the cleaner the lens and camera sensor, the sharper your pictures will be. Dirt, dust, and fingerprints will degrade the image quality of even the finest optics. However, it's equally important to avoid using incorrect cleaning materials which can permanently damage your photo equipment.

This 6-piece cleaning kit contains everything you'll ever need to properly clean your lenses and digital SLR camera, including an air blower, soft brush, cleaning solution, lens tissues, cotton swabs, and a microfiber cloth. Also includes a soft carrying pouch.

ITEM INCLUDES

Precision Design T Mount for Canon EOS with:

1 Year Precision Design USA Warranty

 T-Mount Adapter for Canon EF (EOS) Mount Digital Cameras

T-mount lenses, which feature a 42mm threaded end, are often used for specialty photography or super telephoto applications, and can be a great addition to your lens collection. By simply attaching the proper adapter, T-mount lenses can be used with countless brands and models of SLR cameras, including modern digital SLRs. Most telescopes and microscopes also utilize a T-mount when attached to a camera.

This T-mount adapter is made of a strong, lightweight alloy, and is designed for use with Canon EF (EOS) mount cameras.

ITEM INCLUDES

Rear Lens Cap for Canon EOS with:

1 Year Manufacturer USA Warranty

 Rear Lens Cap for Canon EOS

Protect perhaps the most important and expensive part of your camera outfit -- your lens -- with this durable rear lens cap. This particular cap is specifically designed for use with Canon EOS mount lenses, and will keep the rear glass and other delicate elements of the lens free from dust, smudges, scratches and more.

ITEM INCLUDES

Instruction Sheet for T Mount & Lens with:

1 Year Usa USA Warranty

 Instruction Sheet for T-Mount & Lens

Included with your purchase are a set of Instructions for T-Mount & Lens to help you get the most out of your T-mount lens digital SLR photography.

ITEM INCLUDES

Free Prints from York Photo with:

 50 FREE PRINTS from York Photo

Superb archival quality prints that won't fade over time

York Photo is your best resource for turning great photos into lasting memories! As part of this kit, we will give you 50 4x6 digital prints, FREE when you register online as a new York Photo customer. York Photo will send you an email with a unique link to create your free account and take advantage of this special offer.

Click Here for Offer Details and Additional Information

Membership is free at York Photo. As a leading online provider of digital prints, books, calendars, and photo gifts, York makes superior quality products at everyday low prices. Upload your digital photos and start exploring everything that online photography has to offer!

York makes it incredibly easy for you to get great prints and more. On future orders, York offers 4x6 digital prints for as low as 9 each and sends you special discounts and promotions. Plus, you can share and edit your pictures for free.

York Photo... developing smiles for more than 50 years!

ITEM INCLUDES

1-Year Subscription to Digital Photo Magazine Voucher Card (Must be mailed in to activate) with:

 1-Year Subscription to Digital Photo Magazine

Your #1 Guide for Better Digital Photography

Digital Photo (formerly PCPhoto) is your guide to the best digital photography has to offer. A one-year subscription is included as part of your purchase... that's seven issues packed with valuable tips, tricks and industry news, conveniently delivered to your door!

A prepaid Subscription Voucher Card will be included with your order, which will activate your subscription when mailed to Digital Photo. The first of your seven issues will then be sent to your address (USA and Canadian addresses only) in about 10 weeks. One subscription per household.

Digital Photo is the only magazine dedicated to helping you get the most out of your new digital camera and accessories. Every issue features hands-on equipment reviews, step-by-step instructions, and pro tips. You'll learn how to take better photos and how to use your computer to perfect your images and add exciting effects. The expert staff of Digital Photo will keep you up-to-date on all the latest hardware and software, so you're always on the cutting edge!

You'll get the most out of digital photography and your new camera equipment with Digital Photo!

Weight:22.6 oz (640 g)

Rebel SL1, T1i, T2i, T3i, T3, T4i, T5i, EOS 50D, 60D, 6D, 7D, 5D Mark II III, 1Ds Mark II III, 1D X
